    p

    Hello!
    I am Marisa Bivi

    UX Designer

    With a background in graphic design, I have a strong visual direction to UX projects. While I didn’t realize it right away, I've always had a passion for seamless user experiences; I analyze everything I see, question what is or isn’t and always think about how improvements could be made.

    I enjoy collaborating with a team, especially users, to create delightful experiences in digital products. Solving difficult problems with simple solutions that appeal to users of assorted backgrounds and diverse needs is an approach I take pride in. However, I do have a tenacious weakness for tea and sweats.

    E-mail: hello@marisabivi.ca
    Address:
    Ottawa ON, Canada
    Status: Accepting freelance work
    download resume

    Past Projects

    The Deck of Many

    UI, UX, App Design // 2017
    -->

    Work Experience

    ProntoForms

    UX Designer // May 2019 - Present

    After enjoying the work I did in many past UX/UI projects, I finally made the choice to focus in. I work in a small UX team in ProntoForms and see features from their rough start to being released to clients.

    Irdeto

    In-House Graphic Designer // April 2018 - March 2019

    At Irdeto, I work to maintain a strong brand presence in the various assets that are produced for the companies marketing and internal communication. This ranges from designs ready for print such as solution and case study booklets, large booth for global events, and poster as well as designs for use on web such as Social Media, Web ads and the company websites.

    Arctic Leaf (formerly Arctic Empire)

    Junior Designer // Mar 2016 - April 2018

    While my education base was strong, as my first design job in an agency, I've learned a lot and still continue to grow my knowledge further everyday here. I've learned how to work with clients and meet their requirments whether its a onetime project like a website or PowerPoint to building a strong ongoing brand image from logo, to websites to creating content for their social media and email campaigns and much more.
